quest.name: Alisaie's Stones
journal: Hirase is impressed by your industrious nature.
objectives: Use the rotting fish to lure out aggressive sharks and slay them.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: You've been busy, haven't you? And now you're here to ask if I need help with anything? Heh, now that you mention it...

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Lately we've had trouble with ravenous sharks that've been leaping out of the water and making off with our fish. Damndest thing, I know, but you wouldn't doubt it if you saw it.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: We've got to cull the thieving bastards regularly─so happens I sent three of my mates out there before you came along. Still, the more the merrier. If you can kill two or so, that ought to be enough.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: Take a few of those rotting fish as bait. I'll not be needing them. Oh, and maybe see if you can't find the other group. They've been away longer than I like.

dialogue.name: HIRASE
dialogue.text: To be honest, I'm more worried about my mates than the sharks at this point. They should've come back by now...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Away with you!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: Oh, kami be praised! I don't know what I would've done if you hadn't come along.

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: My partners and I got separated when we fled. You haven't seen them, have you?

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: Damn... Before the Kojin started chasing us, their leader asked us if we were Doman...

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: They're Yotsuyu's catchers, I know it! First Isari, and now this! I've got to tell Rasho and the others!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text:
We've been keeping busy. How about─
Oh no, you've got that look. What happened now?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, Forename. I heard you went shark hunting?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We too did our fair share of beast culling─though I think Lyse made a stronger impression when she bested a drunken pirate in a sparring match. Fastest knockout to date, I am told.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text:
I should like to think we have proven ourselves to be rather─
Hm. Why do I get the feeling you have something important to tell me?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Kojin mercenaries rounding up Doman Confederates? Surely Yotsuyu has crossed the line now...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We must go and speak with Rasho immediately. Even he cannot deny that this changes everything.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At least, I should like to think that he cannot...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: What is Yotsuyu thinking, kidnapping Confederates? She has to know they won't take this lying down.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We need to speak with Rasho immediately!

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: ...Let's get this over with, shall we?

obj.n: Ruby Cotton Fingerless Gloves of Casting
The Girl with the Pearl Ring
